name: Random Dice 14
description:
How to play this game:

1) The big die on the left is your current number.

2) On the right there is a field with four zones in four cells each...

3) The zone must contain a otal number 14 no more and no less. If in any zone there is a total number not 14, you will lose.

4) However, you can select any zone and any cell in it
